name: Chickpeas With Thai Chilies
keywords: chickpea, thai chili, side dish, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 20 Thai chilies or other small hot chilies, dried or fresh
1 1/2 cups cooked or canned chickpeas, drained

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a pan or wok over medium high heat until just smoking. Add chilies and stir-fry for a minute or two or until they start to brown and puff. Do not let them burn.
Immediately add chickpeas and cook until they heat through, about 7 minutes, stirring occasionally. Put in bowl, pick out chilies and discard them, and sprinkle with cumin.
